section.p: The template is used to record measurments of organs belonging to the study subject

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1081)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1082)
A sequence number for the observation. [SEND: OMSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1083), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Organ Measurement Examination Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1557)
A value to indicate the particular organ measurement observation. [SEND: OMTESTCD, OMTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:1085), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1558)
Used to indicate whether or not a measurement has been performed. [SEND: OMSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1086)
The recorded organ measurement finding as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SEND: OMORRES, OMORRESU, OMSTRESC, OMSTRESN, OMSTRESU]

Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1087)
Information on whether a predefined data item was collected, and the timing of collection.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1088)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1089)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1090)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (CONF:1091), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:1092)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). It is used to record observations to be excluded from tabulation. [SEND: OMEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1093)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1094)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1095)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1081)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1082)
A sequence number for the observation. [SEND: OMSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1083), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Organ Measurement Examination Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1557)
A value to indicate the particular organ measurement observation. [SEND: OMTESTCD, OMTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:1085), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1558)
Used to indicate whether or not a measurement has been performed. [SEND: OMSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1086)
The recorded organ measurement finding as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SEND: OMORRES, OMORRESU, OMSTRESC, OMSTRESN, OMSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (CONF:1091), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:1092)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). It is used to record observations to be excluded from tabulation. [SEND: OMEXCLFL]

Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1087)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)
Information on whether a predefined data item was collected, and the timing of collection.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1088)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1089)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1090)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1093)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1094)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1095)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
